title: Introducing: DropXLife
content:
Those that follow the Toronto collective XO closely will no doubt have heard of DropXLife, a member of the mysterious group who’s been receiving a notable level of hype recently. The first dose of his work was originally presented as an unofficial Mixtape named ‘Pawncho’. Since then the jams have been repackaged, 3 tracks have been added and the set has been renamed ‘AllXLegends’. The tracks themselves have a remarkable similarity to the work of The Weeknd; yet still manage to offer something different entirely. The set of 9 instrumentals are slow, sexy and seductive, with subtle and gentle introductions of bass offering a seedy underbelly to the glistening and pristine productions.

Apart from the Mixtape and the fact that DropXLife is part of the XO collective, very little else is known about the man/woman. It’s likely this will continue, but when it comes to XO, that’s half the fun.

Stream the original Pawncho Mixtape below and download the completed AllXLegends Mixtape here.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d24
